name: OKX BETH
description: What is BETH? BETH is a yield-bearing liquid staking token representing staked ETH at a 1:1 ratio on OKX. What can I use BETH for? BETH provides additional liquidity and access to additional earning opportunities while still earning BETH rewards, including: • BETH/USDT and BETH/ETH Spot trading • BETH as collateral for loan and trading • BETH as campaign entry to earn airdrop rewards
